“The whole of the realm denies it, brother.. No one wants you for their king. Sorry.”

-Renly Baratheon
#asoiaf http://t.co/nypS71vIOT

"I'll be blamed.. Ever since that time I lost my horse. He was white & it was snowing, what did they expect?"

-Edd http://t.co/Kf1LBy0rsv
RT @LiaThe_Loneone: #FF To The BEST QUOTES Account on Twitter @SerASOIAF I look forward to their daily tweets! ❤️❤️❤️❤️

That will not happen to me, Dunk vowed. I will show them that I can be more than a hedge knight.

-Duncan the Tall http://t.co/jq9W1uwPOu

"In this world only winter is certain. We may lose our heads, it's true.. but what if we prevail?"

-Eddard Stark
#RR http://t.co/5TV0vi4cM1

"They call them puff fish, Grandmother."

"Of course they do, Summer Islanders have no imagination."

Margaery/Olenna http://t.co/y0LdIQ4QrT

“If my aunt wants Meereen, she’s welcome to it. I will claim the Iron Throne by myself."

-Aegon Targaryen VI
#asoiaf http://t.co/IJJRztkbt4

"Elia of Dorne. I killed her screaming whelp. Then I raped her. Then I smashed her fucking head in. LIKE THIS!"

-Gregor Clegane
#asoiaf
When I die, please bury with me a crossbow, so I can thank the Father Above the same way I thanked the father below. http://t.co/OvQWuHYTJk

He wondered what Meera would think if he should suddenly tell her that he loved her.

-Bran Stark
#asoiaf http://t.co/9ofsrKwnNa

-Brienne

"Men of honor will do things for their children that they would never consider doing for themselves."

"Edd, fetch me a block."

-Jon Snow

"He pointed to the spear, then to my mother’s tears, and I picked up the spear."

-Obara Sand
#asoiaf http://t.co/EUe3RPFlqe

"I want to see, kof you ride that, kof kof pig Uncle. I want...It's, kof,the pie. I,kof, I can't, kof kof kof..."

Joffrey Baratheon
#asoiaf

"An admiral without ships, a hand without fingers, in service of a king without a throne."

-Leona Woolfield
#asoiaf http://t.co/TqHlYcxdfn

Come at once. Help me. Save me. I need you as I have never needed you before. I love you, I love you, I love you. Come at once.

-Cersei

"I built in stone. Stone does not burn."

To which Aegon said, "When the sun sets, your line shall end."

#TWOIAF http://t.co/2W23MEmv2K

Nymeria took 10,000 ships to sea, searching for a new home for her people, beyond the long reach of Valyria.

#TWOIAF http://t.co/lJj9Q6rSfs

"I am malformed, scarred, and small, but... I could be... I could be good to you."

-Tyrion Lannister
#asoiaf http://t.co/PQuhMNgMl6

A man might befriend a wolf, even break a wolf, but no man could truly tame a wolf.

-Haggon
#asoiaf http://t.co/thy8rKVeq8

"Silver’s sweet & gold’s our mother, but once you’re dead they’re worth less than that last shit you take as you lie dying."

-Ben Plumm

There are ghosts in Winterfell, he thought, and I am one of them.

-Theon Greyjoy
#asoiaf 
#HappyHalloween http://t.co/T9AH9hgIE4

"If we leave our smells behind us when we leave a room, surely something of our souls must remain when we leave this life?"

-Qyburn
#asoiaf

"By what right does the wolf judge the lion? BY WHAT RIGHT?"
               
-Jaime Lannister
#asoiaf http://t.co/QJCnqeM4mc

"Shadows are servants of the light, the children of fire. The brightest flame casts the darkest shadows.

-Melisandre http://t.co/KE33UY86bS

“I saw him. He was cleaning Ice.”

“Your heart yearns for your father & your home, so that is what you saw.”

Bran/BR http://t.co/sFxhubZ2xN

"I am almost a woman grown, ser. I’ll let you spank me, though… but first you’ll need to tilt with me, & knock me off my horse."

-Elia Sand

Some allies are more dangerous than enemies.

-Tyrion Lannister
#asoiaf http://t.co/M6BDReq6F9

"The boy needs a bit of seasoning is all"
 
"Aye, a pinch of pepper, & a few nice cloves, & an apple in his mouth." http://t.co/R1d7kJNumJ

"Get him!" one man shouted. "He's alone!"

"COME!" he roared back. "Come kill me, if you can."

-Victarion Greyjoy http://t.co/pAsASUcRiM

“They are their father’s daughters."

The little princess smiled. “Three Oberyns, with teats.”

-Doran & Arianne http://t.co/NYzrRf036X

"I ask you, Ned, what good is it to wear a crown? The gods mock the prayers of kings and cowherds alike."

-Robert Baratheon
#asoiaf

"Jaime & I are more than brother & sister. We are 1 person in 2 bodies. When he is in me, I feel... whole."

-Cersei http://t.co/fjvkXEt2rs

“Be certain you reach Westeros before my sister falls & someone more competent takes her place.”

-Tyrion
#asoiaf http://t.co/jEyyBtscaf

-Robb Stark http://t.co/AKjxH7OqYo

"They will find your body with a needle still locked between your frozen dead fingers."

-Jon

-Theon Greyjoy

"Joffrey would have killed me once he came into power. For the crime of being short & ugly, of which I am conspicuously guilty."

-Tyrion

-Septon Meribald http://t.co/1raNlHC80G

"None of us is ever ready."

"For knighthood?"

"For death."

-Barristan & Eddard

-Brienne

-Quaithe

-Joffrey

"Needlework.”

“Very restful, isn’t it?”

“Well,” said Arya, “not the way I do it.

-Ravella Swan & Arya

Gods, I hope not.

-Daeron Targaryen

The best of them overcame their flaws, did their duty, & died with their swords in their hands.

-Sam POV
